name: Pocket Craft: Survivor Mode
description:
Beware!...
Zombies are coming... You have to find or build shelter before the sun set. If they catch you will lose health and die. But you can fight them back or torch them and watch them burn : hahahaha...

Pocket Craft lets you skilled craftsman to create your perfect dreamland with unlimited sources. Hours of fun waiting awaits you: make houses with amazing gardens, castles, forests and go mining, go swimming etc and fun is free forever you are the god of your own universe be a loving one or destroyer its all up to you. Inspired by Minecraft game.
The audience of the game is anyone who want to use their creativity to create structures from the blocks they can find. What they can create is limitless and not bound to the map they are born in. In this sense, it is a sandbox game made for everyone who would like to use their creativity to build.

The main features include over 50 different types of block players can use to build their creations, in addition to tools they can use to remove and collect blocks. You can dig or build underground. More features are coming soon!

With this update there is Brand new maps, day/night mode, zombies, pirates, skeletons, dungeons, dragons and more! Can you survive this world of craft? or can you crafting to survive? You can try your best!

Give us 5 starts to improve the game for you and please leave comment. Which upgrade do you want after animals. We appreciate the support. Thanks...
